DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Changes the MOPP level of the unit. Changing MOPP level requires some transition time.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>MoppLevel</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>MOPP Level</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Level 0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Level 0;Level 1;Level 2;Level 3;Level 4</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
